title: Welcome to Agentwood!
description: Everything you need to know to start your journey.
content:
# Welcome to Agentwood!

We are building the next generation of open-ended conversational AI. On Agentwood, you can chat with ultra-realistic characters, roleplay complex scenarios, and create your own unique AI companions.

## What can I do here?

- **Chat**: Talk to characters created by the community. They can be anything—from helpful assistants to dramatic roleplay partners.
- **Create**: Bring your ideas to life. Give them a name, a voice, and a personality.
- **Discover**: Browse thousands of characters in the [Discovery Feed](/discovery).

## Is it free?
Yes! You can chat for free forever. We also offer **Agentwood Pro** for power users who want faster speeds and higher-quality voice models.

title: Creating a Character: The Basics
description: How to make your first AI character in minutes.
content:
# Creating a Character

Making a character is easy and fun. Here’s how to get started:

1. Click the **Create** button in the sidebar.
2. **Name**: Choose a name (e.g., "Sherlock Holmes" or "Your Yandere GF").
3. **Greeting**: This is the first thing they say. It sets the scene!
   > *Example: "I've been waiting for you... where have you been?"*
4. **Avatar**: Upload an image or use our AI generator to make one.
5. **Visibility**: Choose 'Public' to share with the world, or 'Private' for your eyes only.

That's it! You can start chatting immediately.

title: Advanced Definition (Personality)
description: Using example dialogue to define personality.
content:
# Advanced Definition

The secret to a great character is the **Definition**. This is where you teach the AI *how* to speak using example dialogues.

## Example Messages
Use the format `{{char}}: message` to show how they talk.

### Example: A shy character
```text
{{char}}: U-um... hello there. I didn't see you come in.
{{char}}: P-please don't look at me like that! It's embarrassing...
```

### Example: An arrogant villain
```text
{{char}}: Kneel before me, mortal! You are nothing but dust beneath my boots.
{{char}}: Hahaha! Did you really think you could defeat me?
```

## Variables
- `{{user}}`: References the person chatting with the bot.
- `{{char}}`: References the character's name.

The more examples you provide, the better your character becomes!

title: Giving Your Character a Voice
description: How to use Voice Cloning and TTS.
content:
# Character Voice

Agentwood characters can speak! You have two options:

1. **Select a Voice**: Choose from our library of pre-made voices (Anime, Narrator, Deep, etc.).
2. **Voice Cloning**: Upload a short audio clip (15s) to clone a unique voice.

> **Tip**: Clear audio with no background noise works best for cloning.

title: Community Guidelines
description: Rules for creating safe and fun content.
content:
# Community Guidelines

We want Agentwood to be a welcoming place for everyone.

## What is allowed?
- **Roleplay**: Creative writing, adventure, romance.
- **Private Content**: Characters you create privately are yours.

## What is NOT allowed?
- **Illegal Content**: Any content depicting illegal acts, CSAM, or non-consensual violence is strictly prohibited.
- **Harassment**: Do not create characters based on real people for the purpose of harassment.

See our [Terms of Service](/terms) for full details.

title: FAQ: Memory & privacy
description: Common questions about how the AI works.
content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Do characters remember me?
Yes! Characters have long-term memory. They remember facts you tell them and the history of your conversation.

## Can creators see my chats?
**No.** If you chat with a Public character, the creator of that character **cannot** see your conversation. Your chats are private to you.

## Can I delete my chats?
Yes. You can delete specific messages or restart a chat entirely from the chat settings menu.
